description:
Becoming A Cable TV Installer is not as hard as you think. In this course, you will discover how to do the basic applications, to hook up, install and activate your cable TV. You will learn how to hook up multiple components, such as, Flat screen TV, stereo, surround sound, dvd players, and more.

Once you learn these tricks of the trade, you will be able to able to any cable TV installer job, in your local area, if you follow these steps. Includes: 9 videos and bonus footage of hooking up your surround sound system.
title: Cable TV Installer Training
